_header: Some man goeth still of wisdom and reason
_description: (?) John Lydgate, Verses advising to guard your tongue — twenty-two 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with refrain, ‘Alle goo we stille the Cock hath lowe shoon’

BLHar2255.First Lines:
SVm man goth stille of wysdam & resounA forn provided can kepe
                    weel scilence…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…Tyl it be loost stoole thyng is nat soughtAlle goo we stille
                    the Cok hath lowe shoon
